name: FitnessTracker
description: Goal of this project was creating a fitness app website, which allows users to track calories by adding meals, set nutrition goals, track body weight and workout progress

name: ChatApp
description: Goal of this project was creating a chat app website, which allows users to enter one of chat channels which are divided by topics (e.g Music, Fitness, Gaming, Gardening)

name: WebForum
description: Goal of this project was creating a forum website which allows user to create post and other users to comment it, give it a rating

name: GameStore
description: Goal of this project was creating a game store website, which allows user to  search for a products sorted by console type, add products to shopping cart and also delete it from the cart

name: FastTyping
description: This app makes it possible to practice fast typing skill, user has a strict ammount of time to enter random phrase

name: Piano
description: This app makes it possible to play piano and choosing in which octave user wants to play

name: DragAndDropGame
description: This app is a simple game which consists of draggin a ball and dropping it in a right place

name: Snake
description: This is a simple snake game using canvas
